clinical_study.brief_title: Spine Procedures Assisted With RoboTics And Navigation
clinical_study.official_title: Spine Procedures Assisted With RoboTics And Navigation Registry

collaborator.agency: Pediatric Orthopaedic Society of North America
Hospital for Special Surgery, New York

brief_summary.textblock: Creation of a pediatric robotic spine surgery Registry will allow for data collection and analysis on the coupled use of robotics and navigation in pediatric spine deformity surgery across participating study institutions. Eventually, an educational and informative framework for this technology will be established.

primary_outcome.measure: proportion of pedicle screws within 2 mm of cortical breach
primary_outcome.description: The proportion of pedicle screws within 2 mm of cortical breach when assessed on intraoperative O-arm scans and postoperative CT scans (when applicable).

secondary_outcome.measure: radiation dose to patient and surgeon per screw
secondary_outcome.description: Radiation dose to patient and surgeon per screw based on the following imaging studies when performed: preoperative CT scan, intraoperative O-arm scans, and fluoroscopy.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, and 5 Years
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaires will be completed by both the patient and caregiver based on their appropriate diagnosis (i.e. idiopathic, congenital, spondylolisthesis, etc.).

secondary_outcome.measure: Caregiver Priorities & Child Health Index of Life with Disabilities (CP Child)

secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaires will be completed by both the patient and caregiver based on their appropriate diagnosis (i.e. idiopathic, congenital, spondylolisthesis, etc.).

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) Physical Activity
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, and 5 Years
secondary_outcome.description: "Self-reported capability rather than actual performance of physical activities. This includes the functioning of one's upper extremities (dexterity), lower extremities (walking or mobility), and central regions (neck, back), as well as instrumental activities of daily living."

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) Emotional Distress - Anxiety
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, and 5 Years
secondary_outcome.description: "Fear (fearfulness, panic), anxious misery (worry, dread), hyperarousal (tension, nervousness, restlessness), and somatic symptoms related to arousal (racing heart, dizziness)."

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) Emotional Distress - Depressive Symptoms
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, and 5 Years
secondary_outcome.description: "Negative mood (sadness, guilt), views of self (self- criticism, worthlessness), and social cognition (loneliness, interpersonal alienation), as well as decreased positive affect and engagement (loss of interest, meaning, and purpose)."

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) Physical Function - Mobility
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, and 5 Years
secondary_outcome.description: "Activities of physical mobility such as getting out of bed or a chair to activities such as running."

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) Pain - Interference
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, and 5 Years
secondary_outcome.description: "Consequences of pain on relevant aspects of one's life. This includes the extent to which pain hinders engagement with social, cognitive, emotional, physical, and recreational activities."

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) Peer Relationships
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 6 Months, 1 Year, 2 Years, and 5 Years
secondary_outcome.description: "Quality of relationships with friends and other acquaintances."

Data collection on time related to robotics-navigation, including registration, screw planning, screw placement, and total time related to platform use defined as the beginning of registration to last screw placement.
EBL during surgery will be reported by the surgeon or extracted from surgical documentation.
Capital expenses associated with the equipment and software, preoperative planning time, surgical time, and costs for revision surgery caused by screw malposition.

arm_group.description: Standard of care surgery using robotics coupled with navigation

study_pop.textblock: Study participants will be those receiving treatment for spinal deformity at one of the participating sites. Eligible patients will be identified from clinical databases of children undergoing surgery for spinal deformity.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of a spine deformity
- Scheduled for surgery using robotics and navigation
- Younger than 18 years of age (0-17 years old)
- Speak and read English or Spanish
Exclusion Criteria:
- Children with cognitive or developmental delay who cannot self-report

patient_data.ipd_description: The data for this study may also be sent to the Pediatric Spine Foundation Study Group (PSSG) and/or the HARMS Study Group in the future. The study data may be stored in PSSG for use in future research studies conducted by the members of PSSG. To help protect participant confidentiality, any data we send to these groups will not include their name or any other identifying information. Data will be tagged with a study ID.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: The sharing timeline is dependent on study investigators and will be considered after enrollment closure.
